nodes.text: Vardax was a male Human Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War, and the Galactic War, who resided on Balmorra. He was killed by Republic and Jedi forces during the liberation of the planet along with his apprentices.

Vardax first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion enemy NPC on the Republic version of Balmorra, where he and his two apprentices block the way to the stat-boosting Datacron 57 in the Gorinth Canyon.
